name: Your Lucky Charm
description:
Your Lucky Charm is a slice-of-life dating sim about the power of community.

CHARACTERS

FEATURES

  • Over 45,000 words
  • 3 different love interests with 9 endings total
  • Partial voice acting
  • A beautiful original soundtrack by Kris Zaballero

CONTENT WARNINGS

Rating Teen+ for: alcohol mention, cartoon violence, language, mild sexual/romantic situations

CREDITS
